# Summary:

This reproduction of the paper 'Sexism and the far-right vote: The Individual dynamics of gender backlash by Eva Anduiza & Guillem Rico' examines how sexism has played a role the electoral rise of the far-right party, Vox, in Spain. Anduiza and Rico () argue that having sexist beliefs is one of the most influential attitudinal predictors of voting for the far-right party Vox in 2019 and 2020.
